description: It is a lovely Patchouli doll. It will give you advice if you use it. It is powered by magical power and is possessed little by little by holding it.

It is an unclean maiden resurrected by the dead spirits. The appearance is almost the same as before. I succeeded in putting a spirit mark on my forehead and taking away my ego and operating it as a ceremony.

use_action.friendly_msg: When the spiritual power was infused, the shrine maiden Yomi stood up and began to watch the surroundings.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of spiritual power did not go well, and the shrine maiden Yomi became an enemy!

description: Fresh bamboo shoots are boiled, cut into pieces of appropriate size and then salted. Fermented for about 1 to 2 months and dried in the sun will give you a delicious, dried noodle.

use_action.msg: Fermentation advanced enough. Let's be sun-dried.
use_action.not_ready_msg: Fermentation has not progressed sufficiently yet.

description: Time is flowing rapidly by using a time expansion system. If it is this, maturation will be finished in about two years.

use_action.msg: Aging for five hundred years is over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

description: It is a gift for a new human being who lives in the end of the century. What kind of world will it be after five hundred years? I would like you to eat this pickled plum under the wonderful civilization.

use_action.msg: Aging for five hundred years is over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name.str_sp: Umeboshi (one hundred years of rapid ripening)

use_action.msg: One hundred years of aging are over. It will surely be delicious.

description: It is ripened ume for aging to bring out more delicious taste. I look forward to living with umeboshi for over a hundred years. Let's live in the end of the century.

description: Sun drying of plum radish is called soil drying. As well as increasing umami taste, sterilization by sunshine sterilization and storability are enhanced by skipping moisture. (Please use it when it becomes 80 (Please keep carrying this item on a sunny day))

use_action.need_charges_msg: It has not dried enough yet.

description: Apricot can be used in the same way as plum. It is pickled plum with 20% salt. Plum vinegar comes out after putting weight on for a while. It needs to be aged for about a month.

use_action.msg: It's ready now. Let's dry it and make it umeboshi.

description: It is a coin that improves the purification power by attaching a rotation mechanism to the tip. Demonstrate your ability to start. Ha ...... I remember seeing similar weapons in Wizardry.

use_action.msg: When the motor starts up, the paper balloon starts moving ......! Let's find out the end of the century!
use_action.need_charges_msg: The battery needs to be filled to start up.

description: It is a coin that improves the purification power by attaching a rotation mechanism to the tip. The high-speed rotating paperboards * search * every century end.

use_action.msg: The rotors slowly dropped in motion and eventually became quiet.
